line.comment: * - Improved searching for illegal fabs
* SWLU Team (28-07-24)
* - Added wait at line 16 to fix random freezes
* find a new patrol sector
* follow some ships, see if they are hostile or if there are hostile ships inrange
* $flags = [Find.Nearest] | [Find.Multiple]
* note: check for quantum combobulator?
* only protect friends, or attack enemies
* find any enemies in range
* else check if there are any stations in range
* if we havn't found anything, perhaps an enemy station exists (Player?)
* check the target is still valid
* recompute the distance and continue to follow
* if the ship is an enemy, migiht as well call in backup
* scan player factories for drugs
* no enemies yet, check if a war should happen (10% chance)
* visit military outpost every once in a while
* only call to sector once until we've checked another sector
* check for any illegeal station within range

sval.val: Scan for enemies, drug complexes
scan drug fabs

if we havn't found anything, perhaps an enemy station exists (Player?)
check the target is still valid
recompute the distance and continue to follow
if the ship is an enemy, migiht as well call in backup

visit military outpost every once in a while
